txt.en: The map is on a table beside Gerja in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should pick up the map.
DNT - Find the moss covered troll

DNT - 'Merchants from other Dwarven cities would come as well, bearing gems and jewelry or barrels of ale and mead, all crafted in their own halls. Can you imagine the gap full of Dwarves from all over, mingling, haggling, toasting, and feasting together? What a glorious sight it must have been! We shall make it so once more.
Thyfli is in a small camp north of Bazanmanar.\n\nGerja has asked you to bring a copy of the completed map to Thyfli.
'Well met, friend! You bring me a copy of the completed map? Most excellent! Gerja told me to let you know that you may acquire a copy of your own from any quartermaster, should you like.'
DNT - Gerja Defthand is in Bazanmanar.\n\nYou should let Gerja Defthand know what you found in museum.
DNT - ROCKMUSEUM is in northeastern Clovengap.\n\nYou should search for the old ore exhibit.
DNT - 'Welcome back! Did you find Dashât-zahar?'

'My friend, thank you so very much! Your tireless assistance has assured our victory! With your help, our map of Clovengap is complete! I made a copy of the map for Thyfli. Will you please bring it to him in the camp north of here? You will find the map on the table beside me.\n\n'Should you desire of copy of your own, they will be available from any of Gundabad's quartermasters.'
With your assistance, Gerja has created a detailed map of Clovengap. The war will go more smoothly now, thanks to your scouting.
Pick up the map of Clovengap
